name: Liqvid
description: Liqvid derives its name from two root words: ‘𝘓𝘪𝘲𝘶𝘪𝘥𝘶𝘴’ for ‘𝘧𝘭𝘰𝘸𝘪𝘯𝘨’ in Latin and ‘𝘝𝘪𝘥' for ‘𝘵𝘰 𝘬𝘯𝘰𝘸 𝘰𝘳 𝘭𝘦𝘢𝘳𝘯’ in Sanskrit. Our philosophy hinges upon the idea of 𝙥𝙚𝙧𝙨𝙤𝙣𝙖𝙡𝙞𝙯𝙚𝙙 𝙡𝙚𝙖𝙧𝙣𝙞𝙣𝙜 - learning that takes the shape of the learner. Liqvid eLearning Services Pvt. Ltd. (Liqvid) is headquartered in Noida (NCR) and has offices in Washington, USA, and Singapore. Some of the world’s leading publishers, educational institutions, and enterprises have trusted us for their custom eLearning, content development and content conversion for digital learning, hosted LMS, and managed training service needs. We are pioneers in English language learning technology, and our product EnglishEdge (CEFR mapped) is an established program in the educational and professional development industry. We now bring Artificial Intelligence-driven personalized learning to our partners and clients. We are making digital learning affordable and easily scalable to the EdTech industry.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Get high-quality digital English learning solutions that boost your learners' confidence and communication skills.
ShortDescription: Liqvid derives its name from two root words: ‘𝘓𝘪𝘲𝘶𝘪𝘥𝘶𝘴’ for ‘𝘧𝘭𝘰𝘸𝘪𝘯𝘨’ in Latin and ‘𝘝𝘪𝘥' for ‘𝘵𝘰 𝘬𝘯𝘰𝘸 𝘰𝘳 𝘭𝘦𝘢𝘳𝘯’ in Sanskrit. Our philosophy hinges upon the idea of 𝙥𝙚𝙧𝙨𝙤𝙣𝙖𝙡𝙞𝙯𝙚𝙙 𝙡𝙚𝙖𝙧𝙣𝙞𝙣𝙜 - learning that takes the shape of the learner.

Highlights.name: Extensive Experience in eLearning
Highlights.description: The article mentions that Liqvid has two decades of experience in the eLearning industry. This extensive experience suggests that they have a deep understanding of the field and can provide high-quality services to their clients.

Highlights.name: Personalized Learning with Artificial Intelligence
Highlights.description: Liqvid leverages artificial intelligence to deliver personalized learning experiences. This means that learning content can be tailored to the individual needs of each learner, making it more effective and engaging.

Highlights.name: Variety of eLearning Solutions
Highlights.description: Liqvid offers a variety of eLearning solutions, including eLearning content development, a hosted learning management system, and custom eLearning solutions. This comprehensive approach allows them to cater to the specific needs of different clients.

enhanced_description: Liqvid is an established eLearning services provider, founded in 2002, specializing in personalized learning solutions. Headquartered in Noida with offices in Washington, USA, and Singapore, Liqvid offers a comprehensive suite of services including custom eLearning development, content creation, content conversion for digital learning, hosted LMS, and managed training services. As pioneers in English language learning technology, their CEFR-mapped product, EnglishEdge, is a recognized program in both educational and professional development sectors, aimed at boosting learners' confidence and communication skills. Liqvid now leverages Artificial Intelligence to deliver personalized and scalable digital learning experiences, making learning affordable and accessible for the EdTech industry, leading publishers, educational institutions, and enterprises.
competitive_advantages: Comprehensive Suite of eLearning Solutions (Content Development, Hosted LMS, Custom Solutions, Managed Services)
Pioneering in English Language Learning Technology (EnglishEdge CEFR-mapped)
Strong Track Record and Experienced Team
roi_benefits: Enhanced Learner Confidence and Communication Skills (specifically English)
scalability_features: Support for Global and Large Enterprises
